phrases: You will catch a cold sleeping there, Mari.
But I wanted to read a little more of this book.
But I wanted to read a little more of this book.
Cheesecake I want to be like you and Mama.
Will I be able to, if I read lots of books?
Then you just have to think about a lot of things and try them yourself.
It means producing the things you dream about.
Food and science are the same.
It is got ricotta cheese in it today, huh?
Your palate is as impressive as ever, Mari.
Being born a patissier's daughter makes me happy as a clam!
I wish Papa could have some of this, too.
He gets so into his work, he forgets to eat.
I wonder what he is off doing right now.
The day after our wedding, I lost contact with him for two weeks.
But the lack of contact is proof that he is doing okay.
Incorporated Sekiei Academy Aobadai Middle School
Mari, you are good at cooking, right?
Anyway, he is in the soccer club, as you know.
I was thinking he might like a big, round cake shaped like a soccer ball.
But when I tried to make it...
It was too thick to cook through properly, right?
I thought I would had a great idea for once...
Then why not make a miniature version?
Waka Mizuki must do everything boldly and grandly!
Even if it is just a cake for a childhood friend!
I know we can make a great soccer ball cake!
You know how to make one, right?
Then how are we going to make it?
I do not know, but if we think it over, I am sure it will work out.
Maybe I should not have asked you.
I am told that most invention
only happens after a long series of failures.
That is not very convincing coming from someone
who does trial-and-error answers for tests we already know the questions for.
It is about the way light reflects.
It is about the way light reflects.
How does your face look reflected in the mirror?
How does your face look reflected in the mirror?
The answer is with left and right switched.
It is hard to believe you are the daughter of a world-class scientist.
By the way, is your father still away?
But it seems taking aimless research trips has been his thing for a while, and...
Even if I am gone, do not worry.
This armillary compass will always show you the way.
That is what he told me.
But three years is a long time.
Anyway, today's cake will not take that long, at least.
I will search the internet for how to make it, so just follow the directions, okay?
Let us think it over together!
We should use the knowledge of our predecessors.
If everyone had to reinvent the wheel, civilization would never advance.
The next town over, I think?
But you failed because you could not find out the right way to do it, right?
An AED... do you have an AED?
There is going to be an electric shock.
Press the closed circuit button firmly.
Further electric shock is not required.
Why is she so mad at me?
It caused a ventricular fibrillation, and sent him into temporary cardiac arrest.
Take care on the way home, you two.
You can tell he is a future med student at the top of his class!
Well, let us get to making that cake!
Are you sure it is okay to go into Shun's room without asking?
I do not think he has any dirty magazines or anything.
Of course Shun would not have those things!
Well, even if he did, he would probably have them well-hidden.
I have seen it in Papa's lab before.
This is the recipe I used yesterday...
But that one did not go well at all.
Um... what was that machine called?
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven,
-One, two, three, four, five, -Excuse me, everyone!
What do you think you are doing?
It looks like you hit it when you fell.
If it starts hurting very badly, please come by my clinic.
That girl came out of thin air, and I was so startled...
She was looking at that book... then suddenly, her body started shining...
The Year 1600 (What is now) London, England
The Year 1600 (What is now) London, England I see.
You are from the future, then?
You are from the future, then?
But is this really London in the year 1600?
I am a doctor, as well as a scientist.
This world is full of mysteries.
And there is much that human knowledge does not yet know.
I believe that bringing these things to light and coming closer to the truth
will lead us to a brilliant future.
But you do speak fluent English.
If you really came from the future,
-you must have found the principle that made it possible, and put it to use.
-you must have found the principle that made it possible, and put it to use.
- I am not speaking English... English?
But I do not speak English Is not he speaking Japanese?
It is Dr. Gilbert who is speaking fluent Japanese.
But I do not speak English Is not he speaking Japanese?
Humans can create whatever they imagine, after all.
But I do not speak English Is not he speaking Japanese?
Did you say create whatever they imagine?
Y-You do not know a researcher named Eiji Hayase, do you?
I think maybe we should call the police.
No, if this book is the because,
then Dr. Hayase's research may be involved.
My husband said he wanted you to have it, Shun.
He set out on a research trip so suddenly.
But he wanted you to have that book.
But he wanted you to have that book.
To Shun Mizuki To Shun Mizuki.
I entrust this book to you while I am on my trip.
Keep it safe, and do not tell anyone about it until you understand what it means.
Anyway, we should go to Dr. Hayase's laboratory.
I do not know if he is the doctor you are speaking of,
but several months ago, I met a man from the Orient who praised my research.
I fear I do not know.
He came out of nowhere when I was at the harbor hiring sailors for a job.
He mainly wanted a handshake, but...
I am sure he said them, too.
I thought it a perfect phrase for a scientist.
My father went missing three years ago.
The person you are talking about might be him.
Searching all alone in this strange land for your father...
Speaking of which, what research are you doing, Dr. Gilbert?
Right now, I am experimenting to see why a compass always points north.
I want to explain the mechanism behind it and offer proof.
I suppose that mystery has already been solved in the future?
Why does a compass needle point north?
I have never even thought about it...
Now that I think about it, I do not actually know.
There are various theories on the matter.
For instance, this book says that the needle is pulled by the North Star.
The North Star is always in the northern sky...
But there is no proof of this theory.
Without proof, you cannot be sure it is true.
Some sailors believe that there is a huge magnetic mountain on the North Pole.
But there is no solid proof of this, either.
Why not help me with my research while I am here?
I can show you the way of thinking through which the principles of nature are unlocked.
It is about time for them to come back.
You will see when we get there.
To take her outside dressed like that...
Do you have anything to put on her?
He does not like carrying a lot of things around with him.
But then why even bother having security?
The lights inside must have been shut off...
It is part of a lady's toilette!
But still... if you draw it that tight...
But I cannot believe you were walking around in that obscene outfit.
In this country, any lady would be embarrassed to show her legs like that.
You are the one who used to hang out here.
I never knew he had an underground room.
And it seems to be on a different electrical system.
There must be a stairway to get down there...
Anyway, we cannot do anything unless we get down there.
Find the doctor and take him quickly into custody.
Let us have as little fuss as possible.
Finally back, are you, Eiji Hayase?
Next Episode: Sorrowful Gilbert Finally back, are you, Eiji Hayase?
Mari, you had trouble with Mr. Gilbert's question before, did not you?
Why does a compass needle point north?
I never even thought about it...
Being a scientist means doubting things believed to be common knowledge.
But what will Mr. Gilbert do next?
I have been here the whole time!
We will find out what Mr. Gilbert does next episode!
In the meantime, let us have a little pre-study.
Have you ever seen this tool?
It looks kind of like a compass stood up on its side...
I had a feeling that is what it was!
The principle is that a compass turned on its side,
in other words, perpendicular to the ground, is called a dip circle,
and it is a device for measuring the angle between the horizon and the north pole.
But Doctor, what is it for?
That is what you will find out next week!
Papa, is this segment just a next episode preview?
